TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowViewElement extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeViewEvents
Public Class WorkflowViewElement Inherits ContentControl Implements ICompositeViewEvents
type WorkflowViewElement = class inherit ContentControl interface ICompositeViewEvents

summary.span: 指定 UI 元素的基底類別，包括任何出現在 Windows Workflow Foundation 設計工具畫布上的 UI 元素，以及透過視覺化方式呈現可編輯之不可部分完成項目執行個體的 UI 元素。

span.span: Specifies the base class for any UI element that appears on the Windows Workflow Foundation designer canvas and that visually represents an instance of an atomic item that can be edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所代表的項目範例包括 和 。Examples of items represented by a include and . `WorkflowViewElement` 提供通用的合約設計工具用來呈現視覺化的項目拖曳至設計工具介面，並透過各種編輯動作與其互動。`WorkflowViewElement` provides a common contract that the designer uses to render the visual element onto the designer surface and to interact with it through the various editing actions. 如果您要建置 的設計工具，請使用 基底型別。If you are building a designer for an , you should use the base type. 如果要被視為第一級的項目，在設計工具的畫布上，例如必須是整個畫布或剪下和貼上的情況下，可拖曳的工具箱項目使用的非活動項目`WorkflowViewElement`的基底類別。If there are non-activity elements that need to be treated as first class items on the designer canvas, such as a toolbox item that needs to be draggable throughout the canvas, or for cut-and-paste scenarios, use `WorkflowViewElement` as the base class. 如果您不要在活動設計工具中，所使用的標準活動色彩`WorkflowViewElement`應該做為基底類型，以提供最大的彈性。If you do not want to use the standard activity chrome for an activity designer, `WorkflowViewElement` should be used as the base type to provide the most flexibility. 代表 UI 中的 ，會提供存取模型項目的程式碼，以及允許進行變更的 。A represents a in the UI and provides code access to the model item and an that allows changes to be made. ## Examples 如需示範如何建立新 及 ，以及如何建立兩者間之關聯的程式碼範例，請參閱 文件中的範例。For a code sample showing how to create a new and an , and then how to associate them, see the sample in the documentation.
